content.text: Hasami is a giant desert crab who aided Vivi and the Straw Hat Pirates in escaping from Rainbase and Crocodile. He is a friend of Matsuge, and according to Matsuge's and Chopper's translations, he is a pervert.

Hasami is giant red crab who is usually seen with a leer on his face. His appearance resembles that of a fiddler crab's, with his right claw being bigger than his left. He has a green patch of grass growing on top of his head.
Hasami is kind enough to befriend the Straw Hat Pirates, because they were friends with Matsuge. He, like his friend Matsuge, is perverted and finds dancing women motivating.

Being a giant crab, Hasami is capable of moving great distances across the vast deserts of Alabasta at high speeds. He travels at even higher speeds when he sees a beautiful woman. Like the rest of his species, however, he cannot swim in or tolerate water.

Hasami carried the others off to safety while Luffy fought Crocodile, but only got as far as the Sandora River. Despite being unused to water, he was able to get them halfway across the river before sinking when they used "ero power" (pervert power) after Nami revealed to him her dancer's outfit when it was learned that Hasami apparently likes dancing girls.
During Gedatsu's mini-story, he is seen working for Goro, bringing clients to the hot springs island resort through Dirt Boss' tunnels.
